We keep your
money safe

Data Encryption

We encrypt your data via SSL (an encryption-based Internet protocol) and require OTPs (One-time passwords) for sensitive actions on your account.

Insurance

We protect your funds by only hosting investment opportunities that come with their own insurance convers and have been pre-vetted for maximum security.

PCI-DSS Payment Processing

We handle all your payment processes via a secure and reliable payment processor.
